page.title: 20Credits
page.content:
This Domesday Project has been produced by children aged 7-9 years from two neighbouring First Schools, Seaton Burn with their teacher Alan Wilson, their photographer Malcolm Cowley and Dinnington Village with their teacher Jennifer Dobson.
The Headteachers and staffs of both schools have generously assisted the study with help, encouragement and advice.
The assistance and patience of the people of Seaton Burn and Dinnington is acknowledged, without their help and contributions this Project could not have been produced.
